name: 'FERALPLMER' MODEL
description:
This is pretty outdated, view this lora for a better effect :v here

A Stable Diffusion model merge based on detailed monster or dragon JRPG artwork. Please use feralplmr in your prompt to activate. Try using prompts without the trigger word as well (experimental).

modelVersions.name: v1
modelVersions.description:
This is model is a merge of dtv-pkmn-monster-style and some other model of mine that was trained on dragons. Using low steps is recommended.


example prompt with settings: {{feralplmr}} a hyper realistic illustration of a huge monster raven hybrid, feathers glow in the dark, fractal moonlight, little dragon with glowing scales, award - winning, masterpiece, {{scales, claws, anthro}}, {{high quality}}, epic , photorealism, furred dragon,

Steps: 34, Sampler: Euler a, CFG scale: 9, Seed: 2901884800, Size: 512x512, Model hash: 5dbcf115

meta.prompt: {{feralplmr}} a hyper realistic illustration of a huge monster lava dragon hybrid, feathers glow in the dark, fractal moonlight, little dragon with glowing scales, award - winning, masterpiece, {{scales, claws, anthro}}, {{high quality}}, epic , photorealism, furred dragon,
